sentence.Network_en: The whales migrate some 6,000 miles to breed and calve in the warm lagoons.
sentence.Network_cn: 鲸会迁移6,000海里左右，到温暖的环礁湖生殖繁衍。

sentence.Network_en: When his cows calve each year he keeps one or two calves for his family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的母牛每年产犊时，他都给自家留上一两头。

sentence.Network_en: Their bulls gender without fail; their cows calve and do not miscarry.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的公牛交尾,无不成功; 母牛产子,决无流产.

so now you intend to resist the kingdom of the LORD through the sons of David , being a great multitude and having with you the golden calves Jeroboam made for gods for you .现在你们有意抗拒大卫子孙手下所治耶和华的国．你们的人也甚多、你们那里又有耶罗波安为你们所造当作神的金牛犊。

entry.def: When a cow calves, it gives birth to a calf.

example.ex: When his cows calve each year he keeps one or two calves for his family.
example.tran: 他的母牛每年产犊时,他都给自家留上一两头。

entry.def: Some other female animals, including elephants and whales, are said to calve when they give birth to their young.

example.ex: The whales migrate some 6,000 miles to breed and calve in the warm lagoons.
example.tran: 鲸会迁移6,000海里左右,到温暖的环礁湖生殖繁衍。

entry.def: Calves is the plural of calf.

sentences.sentence: "the whales calve at this time of year"

auth_sentence.content: Twice a year, you really have a good count, you know, when you calve, and then when you sell.
auth_sentence.res_content: Twice a year, you really have a good count, you know, when you calve, and then when you sell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Twice a year, you really have a good count, you know, when you calve, and then when you sell.

sentences.en: They usually require close management during calving.
sentences.cn: 在生小牛期间它们通常需要精心看护。
